name: .YLC File Extension
summary: Learn about .YLC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a YLC file in YouiDraw Logo Creator (Web). To do so, open Logo Creator in your web browser and select File → Open From Local Disk. Then, navigate to and open your YLC file.
After opening a YLC file in YouiDraw Logo Creator, you can select File → Export to convert the image to a PNG or JPEG file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
